headline: From Crisis to Comeback: How Dow Inc Became 2026’s Unlikely Winner
summary: Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) has delivered one of 2026’s most surprising turnarounds. The chemical giant’s stock has surged 40% year-to-date through the end of Thursday’s trading, from $23.38 to $32.65. This rally comes despite the company posting a $2.6 billion net loss in 2025. What’s driving this dramatic reversal, and can it continue? The Transform to ... From Crisis to Comeback: How Dow Inc Became 2026’s Unlikely Winner
